articles.author: Pranati Deva
articles.title: Budget 2024: Motilal Oswal outlines investment strategies for equity, fixed income, and gold amid market volatility | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Indian stock market corrects due to profit booking and high valuation concerns. Motilal Oswal Private Wealth advises balanced approach with staggered equity investments, duration-biased fixed income portfolios, and strategic gold holdings for navigating marke…
articles.content: The Indian stock market indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, have experienced a nearly 2 percent correction from their record high levels. This dip comes amid profit booking and concerns over high valuation… [+3662 chars]
